{"id": "92f5dabd-1a54-43e4-bbb5-34a751d96900", "instanceId": "5977c8b8-df21-43d7-b876-d26f3aa66a78", "title": "LiveTiles Intranet Hub Web Part", "description": "A Client side web part that renders components from the LiveTiles Intranet Hub.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"description":"Renders LiveTiles Intranet Hub components.","webPartConfigJson":"{\"connectableKey\":\"Documents\",\"configTypeKey\":\"widget_contentItems\",\"title\":{\"de\":\"Kürzlich benutzt\",\"en\":\"Recently used\"},\"tabs\":[{\"connectableKey\":\"RecentlyUsed\",\"layoutTemplate\":{\"configTypeKey\":\"layoutTemplate_list\",\"alternatingBackground\":false},\"itemTemplate\":{\"configTypeKey\":\"itemTemplate_simple\",\"imageDisplayMode\":\"Rounded\",\"imageWidth\":\"2.5rem\"},\"actions\":[{\"configTypeKey\":\"widget_components_actionButton\",\"accentAction\":false,\"title\":{\"expression\":\"_mp.util.translate('viewAll')\"},\"action\":{\"expression\":\"window.open(_mp.connectable.objects.Documents_RecentlyUsed_dataProvider.viewAllUrl.value);\"},\"actionKey\":\"action_viewAll\"}],\"data\":{\"dataSource\":{\"configTypeKey\":\"userDataSource_graph\",\"propertyMappingsKey\":\"propertyMapper_graph_document_insights_simple\",\"queryType\":\"RecentlyUsed\"},\"contentType\":\"Document\"}}]}","webPartHeight":"500px"}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}
